#summary Create an inventory folder.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||RequestMethod||AddInventoryFolder||String||Yes||
||ParentID||The Parent folder UUID||UUID||Yes||
||OwnerID||UUID of the folder owner||UUID||Yes||
||Name||Folder name||String||Yes||
||ContentType||Preferred content type for this folder. Defaults to application/octet-stream||ContentType||Optional||

<pre>
POST /services/ HTTP/1.1
User-Agent: Simian Login Client
Host: thorium.npl.com
Accept: */*
Content-Length: 147
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

`RequestMethod`=`AddInventoryFolder`&ParentID=40f36b6d-d239-4ade-b354-f0f5cb9ce8f8&OwnerID=8e21c2df-32b2-472c-b09b-88b909ba4c86&Name=Default+Appearance
</pre>

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||FolderID||UUID of the folder||UUID||

<pre>
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Sun, 13 Dec 2009 07:23:43 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Grid Services
Content-Length: 51
Content-Type: application/json

{ "FolderID":"2cf49939-b9f0-45af-ad21-b3441de85f52" }
</pre>

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 201
    * The folder was created
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred
